about_the_game:
In "Valkyrie Corridor", you will travel through time and space and enter a mysterious world devastated by a devastating magic war. You will become a brave adventurer, uncover long-forgotten secrets, and meet unknown challenges. You will make friends from all races, each with unique skills and personalities. Through spiritual communication and cooperation, you will form a powerful adventure team to face unknown threats together.

The game not only provides an exciting adventure experience, but also has a rich life system, allowing you to carry out various activities such as planting, mining, fishing, etc. in your home to obtain resources to strengthen the character's strength. In battle, you can use the strategic card system to skillfully use skills and magic, cooperate with your partners to fight, and defeat powerful enemies. Every battle is a contest of wisdom, adding depth and challenge to the game.

In addition, you can explore a mysterious world full of mysteries, from misty forests to ancient ruins, to unlock the secrets and treasures in the Corridor of Destiny. Through social interaction and the guild system, you will meet interesting characters, team up with other players, challenge the world boss together, and enjoy the fun of cooperation and competition.
detailed_description:
In "Valkyrie Corridor", you will travel through time and space and enter a mysterious world devastated by a devastating magic war. You will become a brave adventurer, uncover long-forgotten secrets, and meet unknown challenges. You will make friends from all races, each with unique skills and personalities. Through spiritual communication and cooperation, you will form a powerful adventure team to face unknown threats together.

The game not only provides an exciting adventure experience, but also has a rich life system, allowing you to carry out various activities such as planting, mining, fishing, etc. in your home to obtain resources to strengthen the character's strength. In battle, you can use the strategic card system to skillfully use skills and magic, cooperate with your partners to fight, and defeat powerful enemies. Every battle is a contest of wisdom, adding depth and challenge to the game.

In addition, you can explore a mysterious world full of mysteries, from misty forests to ancient ruins, to unlock the secrets and treasures in the Corridor of Destiny. Through social interaction and the guild system, you will meet interesting characters, team up with other players, challenge the world boss together, and enjoy the fun of cooperation and competition.
name: Valkyrie Corridor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: You will travel through time and space into a mysterious world devastated by a devastating magical war. Transform yourself into a brave adventurer, uncover long-forgotten secrets, and meet unknown challenges.
